(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD may)
      (VP (VB have)
        (VP (VBN noticed)
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBP have)
                (VP (VBN been)
                  (ADJP (RB very) (JJ resistant)
                    (PP (TO to)
                      (S
                        (VP (VBG blogging)
                          (PP (IN about)
                            (NP (NNP Cold) (NNP Soya) (NNP Bean) (NNP Curd))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

              (NP (DT that))
              (PP (VBN compared)

    (, ,)))

                (VP (TO to)

    (, ,)))

  (S
    (NP (DT That))

  (NP
    (NP (NNP Ingredients) (NNP Unisoy) (NNP Soya) (NNP Milk) (NNP Powder) (NNP 60g) (NNP Polleney) (NNP Soyabean) (NNP powder) (NNP 120g) (NNP Coffee) (NNP Mate) (NNP 60g) (NNP Sugar) (NNP 60g) (NNP Poon) (NNP Huat) (NNP Instant) (NNP Jelly) (NNP Powder) (NNPS 28g) (NNP Water))

  (S
    (VP (VB Do) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB add)
        (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NN water))
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN time)))
        (SBAR (IN as)
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (MD will)
              (VP (VB make)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP it))
                  (ADJP (JJ difficult)
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB dissolve))))))))))))
    (. .)))
